Class SwerveDrive

java.lang.Object

      driveSystems.SwerveDrive
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnalogSensor.AnalogSensorListener, Encoder.EncoderListener, Sensor.SensorListener
public class SwerveDrive
extends DriveSystem
implements Encoder.EncoderListener

A class designed to control a Swerve Drive.

Author:
Colin Poler
